dataset.title: Total numbers and species of insects taken from the Oksrukuyik River rock scrubbings taken during the summer of 1989, Arctic LTER 1989.

abstract.para: Total numbers and species of insects taken from the Oksrukuyik River rock scrubbings taken during the summer of 1989.

intellectualRights.para: Acceptance and utilization of LTER data requires that:

listitem.para: The Principal Investigator be sent a notice stating reasons for acquiring any data and a description of the publication intentions.
The Principal Investigator of the data set be sent a copy of the report or manuscript prior to submission and be adequately cited in any resultant publications

A copy of any resultant publications should be sent to:
Principal Investigator Ecosystems Center Marine Biological Laboratory Woods Hole, MA 02543

geographicCoverage.geographicDescription: The Oksrukuyik River in arctic Alaska, approximately 3 km south to 1 km north of the river crossing at the Dalton Highway.

description.para:
Log of changes:
8Mar90. Changed name of file from OCOUNT89.PRN to 89HEOTOT.DOC Removed the working space of the ocount89.wk1 file that held all was all the means of the data. added the site column to the file. removed dots for missing values. File replaced on July 1991 data sets.

For Archival Use:
DATE RECEIVED: 1Mar90, Jul91 DATA FILE ENTERED BY: Julie Pallant DATA FILE VALIDATION: NAME: Julie Pallant DATE: 3Oct91

para.literalLayout: A rock-scrubbing technique was used to collect bottom samples at six different stations (-400m, -320m, -200m, -100m, 727m, and 950m) with three replicates at each station in the Oksrukuyik River. The stations are measured relative to the future placement of the New Oxy Dripper. One sampling date is represented here (10 July 1989). (This is the first date analyzed, others are top priority at the time of this submission.) The samples were preserved in ethanol then picked, sorted, counted, and measured in Duluth using a NIKON MICRO-PLAN II digitizing pad.

Variable Variable descrip. Precis./Units Coded Missing (Y/N) Values SITE Oksrukuyik River y DATE Date DD-MMM-YY n STATION Distance from the NOD meters n SAMPLE Repetition number 1, 2, or 3 n BRACHY Number of Brachycentrus n ORTHOCLAD Number of Orthocladius n BLACK Number of Black Flies n BAETIS Number of Baetis n CHIRON Number of Chironomids n RYACEPH Number of Ryacephila n CHIRPUPA Number of Chironomid Pupae n BLKPUPA Number of Black Fly Pupae n BAET SP3 Number of Baetis "species 3" n CINYG Number of Cinygmula n NEMOURA Number of Nemoura n COMMENTS Notes about data n
